content: body { font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Segoe UI Symbol'; max-width: 800px; margin: 0 auto; } h1 { font-weight: 600; font-size: 3rem; text-align: center; } h1>span { display: block; font-size: 1.5rem; font-weight: 300; } a { display: inline-block; border-radius: 0.25rem; padding: 0.5rem 0.75rem; font-size: 1rem; background-color: rgb(41, 134, 255); color: white; text-decoration: none; font-weight: 600; } a:hover { background-color: rgb(23, 83, 161); } #basics-contact { display: flex; flex-direction: row; gap: 1rem; justify-content: center; } ul { margin: 0; padding: 0; } ul li { list-style: none; } #basics-contact ul { display: flex; flex-direction: row; gap: 1rem; } section>header { width: 100%; padding: 0.5rem 0; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(180, 180, 180); } section>header>h2 { font-size: 2rem; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(63, 63, 63); margin-bottom: 0; } main h3 { font-size: 1.5rem; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(63, 63, 63); margin-bottom: 0; } p { font-size: 1rem; font-weight: 400; color: rgb(31, 31, 31); line-height: 2; } .work-start, .education-dates { font-size: 1rem; font-weight: 300; color: rgb(63, 63, 63); margin: 0 0 1rem 0; } #skills-list { display: flex; flex-direction: row; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 4rem; } #skills-list li { flex: 1; } #skills-list li h3 { margin-bottom: 1.5rem; } #skills-list li ul li { border-radius: 0.5rem; padding: 0.5rem 0.75rem; font-size: 1rem; background-color: rgb(117, 255, 123); color: black; text-decoration: none; font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 1rem; } address { font-style: normal; } #basics-location::before { content: 'ðŸŒŽ'; padding-right: 0.25rem; } #basics-location { display: flex; flex-direction: row; justify-content: center; margin: 1rem; } #basics-location div::after { content: ','; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0; } #basics-location div:last-child::after { content: none; }
